references: A. T. Benjamin and J. J. Quinn, Proofs that really count: the art of combinatorial proof, M.A.A. 2003, p. 15.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1, 1).
formula: a(n) = 11*F(n) = F(n+4) + F(n+2) + F(n) + F(n-2) + F(n-4) with n>3 and F=A000045.G.f.: 11*x/(1-x-x^2). - _Philippe Del√©ham_, Nov 20 2008a(n) = Fibonacci(n+5) - Fibonacci(n-5), where Fibonacci(-5..-1) = 5, -3, 2, -1, 1. [_Bruno Berselli_, May 22 2015]

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
